input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt

Item features:
100% Polyester
Quality tested and ensured for maximum durability
Designed with only the toughest, roughest users in mind
Comfort and Performance come hand in hand with Rothco

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Rothco makes quality outdoor and sports gear for all types of situations. Whether you are in a combat-intensive environment, or if you are a recreational user, Rothco will fit the lifestyle of many. Quality tested for maximum durability, comfort and performance come hand in hand with Rothco. This Marines T-Shirt is made of 100% polyester.
input_text.Response B: This version of the Bliss pump and stiletto from Pleaser will charm everyone that you come near. Its sculpted silhouette and tall heel and platform add a sexy appeal to anything you have on, especially as it lengthens your legs. The glossy upper and adjustable strap add a certain edginess to any occasion. Stiletto Heel Height: Approx. 4 1/4'' Tall. Mini platform pumps Heel Height: Approx 3/4". D'Orsay Style. Heels are made of 100% synthetic material with Leopard print pony hair on the outer portion of the heel. Shoes run approximately 1/2 size small.

label_annotations.factors_b: Reponse B did not use the part about being 100% polyester and is talking about a shoe rather than a t shirt
